torso.transformationDescription:
After just a few moments, the transformation comes to an end, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(let)] out a deep sigh as the itching finally stops, leaving [npc.her] torso covered with mouse-like fur resembling Raichu and Pikachu. [npc.Her] new fur is soft, fluffy, and insulating.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] Raichu/Pikachu, [npc.skinFullDescription].
